<!-- Generated by agents-reverse-engineer -->

# types

Defines shared TypeScript interfaces for file discovery operations: `DiscoveryResult`, `DiscoveryStats`, and `ExcludedFile`. These types provide the contract between discovery filters (`src/discovery/filters/`) and discovery orchestration (`src/discovery/run.ts`, `src/cli/discover.ts`).

## Contents

### [index.ts](./index.ts)
Exports `ExcludedFile` (path + reason), `DiscoveryResult` (files + excluded arrays), and `DiscoveryStats` (counts + exclusionReasons map).

## Type Definitions

### ExcludedFile
```typescript
interface ExcludedFile {
  path: string;
  reason: string;
}
```
Created by `src/discovery/filters/gitignore.ts`, `binary.ts`, `vendor.ts`, `custom.ts` when filtering discovered files.

### DiscoveryResult
```typescript
interface DiscoveryResult {
  files: string[];
  excluded: ExcludedFile[];
}
```
Return type for `src/discovery/run.ts` `discoverFiles()`, consumed by `src/cli/discover.ts` and `src/generation/orchestrator.ts`.

### DiscoveryStats
```typescript
interface DiscoveryStats {
  totalFiles: number;
  includedFiles: number;
  excludedFiles: number;
  exclusionReasons: Record<string, number>;
}
```
Aggregates discovery metrics, computed from `DiscoveryResult` by `src/cli/discover.ts` for CLI reporting.

## Integration Points

- **Producers**: `src/discovery/filters/*` modules create `ExcludedFile` instances during filter passes
- **Consumers**: `src/discovery/run.ts` returns `DiscoveryResult`, `src/cli/discover.ts` computes `DiscoveryStats` for user-facing summaries
- **Cross-module flow**: Walker (`src/discovery/walker.ts`) → Filters (`src/discovery/filters/`) → Run (`src/discovery/run.ts`) → CLI (`src/cli/discover.ts`)
